addSubtitle: Create a new health record for this animal

placeholders.duration: E.g: 5 days, 1 week, Until symptoms resolve, Single dose...
placeholders.frequency: E.g: Once daily, Every 12 hours, Twice a day, As needed...
placeholders.medication: E.g: Penicillin G, Ivermectin, Vitamin B12, Antibiotics...
placeholders.notes: Describe symptoms, treatment given, animal behavior, recovery progress, follow-up needed...
placeholders.reason: E.g: Routine checkup, Limping, Loss of appetite, Fever...
placeholders.reviewedBy: E.g: Dr. Smith, Veterinarian Johnson, Farm Manager...
placeholders.selectType: What type of health event is this?

toast.errorAddingHealthRecord: There was an error adding the health record.
toast.errorGettingHealthRecord: There was an error getting the health record.

validation.dateFormat: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
validation.notesTooLong: Notes must be 500 characters or less
